item.title: Ptt 文章分板判斷
item.description: Data Set ‘Gossiping’, ‘WomenTalk’, ‘Baseball’, ‘C_Chat’, ‘Beauty’ 各 50 頁的文章 jieba 斷詞 Fast text / LSTM Fast Text LSTM Title 0.93 0.87 Text 0.87 0.78 Code on GitHub Best: FastText + title Bayes Best: Title + CountVectorizer Code: Classify by text Classify by title Use Text no cut + CountVectorizer cut + CountVectorizer CountVectorizer + Tfidf with cut Tfidf with cut Accuracy 0.68 0.85 0.83 0.81
